3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Jackie Care - 510-390-8101 - This lovingly updated 1940’s Traditional with its almost LEVEL IN entrance has had multiple upgrades to systems and style.The living and dining areas are open plan with gas burning fireplace and plantation shutters. Enjoy gorgeous updated cooks kitchen + breakfast bar for casual entertaining. Multi zoned heating and desirable air conditioning, owned SOLAR, newer windows, recessed lighting and custom plantation shutters will add to your comfort!With a semi split level layout the lower level family room with its picture window is sunny and bright and opens out to the spacious level garden with multiple areas for dining, gardening or relaxation. A bonus office room allows for work at home, and there is interior access from the garage which also hosts the washer, dryer and additional storage.A beautifully updated full bath with walk in shower is located on the ground floor. Upstairs the front bedroom has extra generous closet space and a peak of the bay and sunset views. The second bedroom overlooking the back garden is also a good size and the shared bathroom maintains its vintage charm.This home is in a well regarded pocket neighborhood with sidewalks, grocery store, bakery, restaurants , parks and schools moments away. A short drive to Montclair village and easy commute!
Confidential Remarks: Home is listed as a 2 bedroom but is large and with potential to be used as 3 bedrooms.  Public records bath and sq ft differ from one recent appraisal and marketing details. The listing agent and the seller will not verify or guarantee the room sizes or the total square footage.

The living and dining areas are open plan with gas burning fireplace and plantation shutters. Enjoy gorgeous updated cooks kitchen + breakfast bar for casual entertaining. A bonus office room allows for work at home, and there is interior access from the garage which also hosts the washer, dryer and additional storage. A beautifully updated full bath with walk in shower is located on the ground floor.  Upstairs the front bedroom has extra generous closet space and a peak of the bay and sunset views. The second bedroom overlooking the back garden is also a good size and the shared bathroom maintains its vintage charm. This home is in a well regarded pocket neighborhood with sidewalks, grocery store, bakery, restaurants , parks and schools moments away. A short drive to Montclair village and easy commute!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Glennie Kramer-Baker - 415-535-2996 - This stunning 4 bed/ 2.5 bath Oakmore Traditional has it all! Built in 1936, this home exudes timeless charm and character, showcasing the craftsmanship and architectural details of the era while seamlessly blending modern updates. Fruiting Citrus trees & blooming Camilla Tree flowers fill the front yard. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by a graceful foyer that leads to the beautiful living room w/ vaulted ceilings, wood burning fireplace & doors that open to a picturesque balcony. The formal dining room connects to the sunny, recently updated eat-in kitchen w/ handmade Cle Tile and SS appliances. Upstairs you’ll find three spacious bedrooms, 2 baths and the fourth bedroom perfect for an office/nursery. Don’t miss the hidden steps up to crow's nest” for star-gazing & enjoying the view! Downstairs is an expansive floor that is an entertainers dream! Complete with a spacious Family Room w/ new tri-fold doors that fully open to the expansive backyard. You'll also find a full bar, game room with pool table, along with a guest space that's perfect to create an ADU. Ideally located on a beautiful street in the heart of Oakmore, you're close to everything; just a stroll down the Bridgeview steps to Rocky's Market, eateries, as well as the Bridgeview Trail for nature lovers!
Confidential Remarks: Contact agent regarding offers- Date TBD Sewer lateral complaint.  Offer Date: Wed, May 24th @ 12:00    Square footage not verified or guaranteed by seller or listing agent. Actual bed/ bath count of home may differ from public record.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Tiffany Lefour - 510-912-6310 - Welcome to 1906 Hoover Ave, where enchanting vintage architecture blends seamlessly with modern updates, and spacious light filled rooms bring joy to everyday living. Beautiful arched doorways and original parquet floors great you from the foyer. The cozy living room beckons as you imagine family and friends flowing from the glow of the wood burning fireplace into the convivial dining room for a memorable meal. The spacious floor plan offers 3 light filled bedrooms and 2 baths upstairs, including a cozy primary suite with built-in cabinetry and a spa like bath with a soaking tub and Juliet balcony overlooking the garden. The 4th bedroom and 1/2 bath are in their own wing off the main level, perfect for guests or a quiet home office. The updated kitchen features quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances and abundant cabinet and counter space, with French doors that open to the garden from the sunny breakfast nook. The terraced backyard is magical, with charming niches and a grass area to lounge and play. The upper garden offers amazing city and bridge views. A lovely place to dine under the stars and host summer gatherings. Convenient shopping and dining and commuting to SF is a breeze with the V line bus taking less than 30 minutes to arrive at the Salesforce Transit Center.
Confidential Remarks: Offers received but none ratified. We will be back on the market early next year. Staging will stay, so showings may be possible by appointment for serious buyers. Neither Sellers nor Listing Agent have verified or guarantee the square footage of the home or lot.
Directions to Property: Park blvd to Leimert to Hoover

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Tracy Davis - 510-301-3924 - Welcome to this bright and beautiful 3 bedroom/2 bath home on a lush south-facing lot with decks and terraced gardens designed for fabulous indoor/outdoor living. The location, straddling the Oakmore and Upper Dimond districts, with convenient access to Joaquin Miller Park, Montclair and Glenview shops and restaurants, groceries at Farmer Joe's and mouth-watering baked goods at La Farine. Built in 1938, the house is warm and inviting. The large eat-in-kitchen opens to a sunny deck perfectly placed for BBQing, another deck for lounging, and one for parties, complete with a deer-proof herb/veggie garden. The living room features custom-built floating shelves and bench-seat, a fireplace, and brand new Marvin dual-pane windows (2023). The split-level allows for great separation of space with 3 bedrooms and a bath upstairs, and an awesome family room that's perfect for an office or entertainment space, complete with a 2nd full bath. The south-facing yard is private and full of sunshine and fruit trees. An attached garage can accommodate a car, bikes or gear. The basement provides additional storage, and a potting shed is set up under the deck. What a great house!
Confidential Remarks: Pending, no more showings. Sq ft and bath count published differs from the public record. PR shows 3br/1.5ba, 7 rooms, 1313 sq ft. MLS sq ft/room count derived from appraisal.*Family room area not included in the 1322 sf, so home is larger than it seems; see floor plan for more info*. Neither seller nor listing agent has verified the accuracy of any of these sources of information. Buyer to investigate with the city. Sewer lateral compliant.

Tucked away on a cul-de-sac like street, this charmer features high ceilings and beautiful hardwood floors. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: A.J. Cohen - Agt: 925-819-2747 - Nestled in Oakland's highly sought after Lincoln Highlands, this home offers an alluring blend of comfort, space, and income potential. Built in 1946, the home spans approx. 3,159 sq ft on a spacious 5,000 sq ft lot. With 4 beds and 2 baths, the main home exudes character and charm. Natural light dances on real hardwood floors, creating an inviting ambiance while dual pane windows amplify the light and bright open floor plan. Step onto one of two decks and be embraced by breathtaking Bay views. The enduring quality of the exterior brick siding not only adds curb appeal but also underscores the property's lasting charm. Thoughtfully landscaped front and back offer spaces for relaxation and leisure. Downstairs lies a fully enclosed separate unit – an exciting prospect for supplementary rental income or multigenerational living. Comprising of a living room, kitchen, bedroom, full bath, and private laundry room, this secondary unit seamlessly combines functionality with privacy and a huge financial upside potential. Positioned in a suburban haven, the property resides mere minutes from exceptional shopping, dining and easy freeway access. Grasp the chance to embrace the epitome of Oakland living, where classic charm effortlessly melds with contemporary amenities. Welcome Home!
Confidential Remarks: Go and show Offer due date 8/17/2023 at 1 pm Square footage of home, room count, separate unit and lot size not verified by seller. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Deidre Joyner - Cell: 510-693-4253 - 3971 Whittle is a 1934 Mediterranean home on a beloved block in the Oakmore neighborhood. The arched front window and arched opening from the entry welcome you into this level-in property. You’ll love the space that this home offers with 2 bedrooms and a bathroom on each level, which includes a spacious primary suite with a large western-facing window to take in a nice sunset sky. Hang out in the den with a fireplace and sliding doors to the backyard, or soak in the sunshine in the stairwell with a large picture window. After raising their 2 boys, Alex and Toby, in this home, it is hard to say goodbye. The longtime owners loved being so close to Dimond Park and Lions Pool, they loved to stop at Peet's for coffee, Dimond Slice for some of the best veggie pizza, and Los Comales for a burrito in the Dimond district of Oakland which is a few blocks away. Up the hill, La Acajou was a frequented café in the Woodminster area. This home has refinished hardwood floors and new solid oak floors added to the kitchen and den. There is new carpet on the stairs and in the upstairs bedrooms, as well as freshly painted interior walls and new made-to-order in the USA light fixtures (2024), but what makes this property great for so many is the opportunity to make it your own.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Sarah H Ridge - Cell: 510-860-3435 - 2551 Potomac, in the heart of Oakland's Lincoln Highlands neighborhood is a charming home on an adorable street. Enter in and find a sweet vestibule which leads to an open concept floor plan in the living and dining area. The kitchen is large and comfortable with a charming peninsula for dining and chatting. Newly refinished hard wood floors throughout lead to the two ample bedrooms (both with custom closet organizers) flooded with all daylight. Out back is a treat to behold with a sunny deck, lovely landscaping and room to run and play. A sleek detached office was installed at the rear of the property which doubles as an exercise or meditation space. Recent hard and soft landscaping make this property feel truly custom. Attached garage can be used as a workshop, office space or for parking. Don't miss this one, it has all the charm! Only 1.1 miles to casual carpool, 1 mile to Grand Ave for restaurants, cafés, .6 miles to Dimond Park.

Public Remarks: Welcome to 5063 Dublin Ave, nestled in one of Oakland's most coveted neighborhoods. This meticulously renovated home offers modern elegance and serene living. Step inside to discover a bright and inviting living room with vaulted ceilings, perfect for relaxation or entertaining. The dining area seamlessly flows into the beautifully landscaped backyard through a sliding door, providing an ideal setting for al fresco dining. The kitchen is a chef's dream, boasting designer finishes, brand new appliances, and ample cabinet space. On the main level, a large bedroom and full bathroom, along with a convenient laundry area, provide added convenience. Upstairs, two generously sized bedrooms await, each flooded with natural light. The primary bedroom features a walk-in closet. The upstairs bathroom is a sanctuary with a luxurious combination of a shower, soaking tub, and double vanity. This home also offers a spacious bonus room, perfect for use as an additional bedroom, office, or playroom. Don't miss the additional storage room. With a new roof, paid-off solar & more, this home is truly turnkey! Situated in a great neighborhood with sidewalks, walk to restaurants, shops & the farmers market. Experience the epitome of modern living in Woodminster/Piedmont Pines - your oasis awaits!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Regina Jacobs - 510-693-7973 - New listing. Spectacular Traditional in the popular Oakmore neighborhood. This home abounds with architectural details and an abundance of natural light. The spacious living room with welcoming hearth offers space to entertain guests and host family gatherings. A delightful bay window and wainscotting provide architectural flare to the gracious formal dining room. A recently remodeled kitchen is tastefully designed, and its breakfast bar provides ample space to entertain. Connecting French doors lead out to an urban oasis. A simply cozy bedroom and half bath complete the main floor. The upper level features a large primary suite with a luxurious primary bath offering a double sink vanity and oversized shower. The second bedroom is conveniently located to the hall bath. A bonus room on this floor is perfect for a home office or nursery. The backyard will make entertaining a breeze with a large deck, level lawn area, patio, and built-in barbecue. A garage with interior access and EV charge completes this gem. Minutes to the Montclair Village, parks & transportation. Open Sunday 2-4pm.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Regina Jacobs - 510-693-7973 - Charming Lincoln Heights bungalow with a modern vibe.  The living room’s corner windows, hardwood floors and welcoming hearth bring the space alive. Multiple windows and the perched location create privacy and light filled rooms throughout. Built-in cabinets and a dramatic accent wall add a focal point to the adjoining the dining room which opens to the kitchen making entertaining a breeze. The thoughtfully updated kitchen features stainless appliances and quartz countertops offering plenty of room for the chef. There are two bedrooms and a bonus room. The first bedroom is cozy and sits across from the recently updated hall bath. The bonus room is perfect for a home office or guest room. The surprise of the home is the spacious second bedroom which is simply stunning highlighted by a vaulted ceiling, wood burning stove, relaxing deck and French doors that open to an urban oasis. The rear yard showcases a generous patio for dining alfresco, level lawn area and a private deck. Convenient to shops, restaurants, parks, and transportation.
